Write a Program to Retrieve ASCII Values 
IDE Used: Eclipse


public class ASCII_Value_5 
{
	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int i;
		
		for(i=65;i<=90;i++)
		{
			System.out.println("ASCII Value of "+(char)i+"=" +i);
		}
	}

}
